revised_title: World-scale Monthly Mapping of Ocean-Atmosphere Gas-Transfer Coefficient
tldr: This article presents a study on the geographical and seasonal variations of the ocean-atmosphere gas-transfer coefficient using meteorological wind data for the year 1982. Monthly maps of the gas-transfer coefficient are derived, revealing seasonal changes and a strong meridional pattern with larger exchange coefficients at high latitudes. The study also assesses the accuracy and representativity of these maps by comparing them with other estimates and validating them through various tests.
